item.title: Add more information
item.description: https://datelist.io - Online booking / appointment scheduling system. Free up to 5 bookings per month, includes 1 calendar

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://nextdns.io - DNS based firewall, 300K free queries monthly

item.title: Merge branch 'master' into patch-1

https://botfront.net/#pricing - Free CDN and DDoS protection
https://botfront.net/ - Free CDN and DDoS protection for one domain and three subdomains

https://www.divio.com/ - A platform to manage cloud application deploying only using Docker. Available free subscription for development projects.
https://prepros.io/ - Prepros can compile Sass, Less, Stylus, Pug/Jade, Haml, Slim, CoffeeScript and TypeScript out of the box, reloads your browsers and makes it really easy to develop & test your websites so you can focus on making them perfect. You can also add your own tools with just a few clicks.
https://freedb.tech - Free MySQL cloud database with remote access up to 100Mb in Database Storage with PhpMyAdmin available and unlimited simultaneous connections.
https://freedb.tech - Free MySQL cloud database with remote access with PhpMyAdmin available. Free tier allows a database up to 100Mb in Database Storage. **If the database exceeding 100Mb will be deleted without any warning.**
https://ide.cs50.io/ - A free IDE powered by AWS Cloud9 by Harvard University.
https://form2channel.com - Place a static html form on your website and receive submissions directly to Google Sheets, Email, Slack, Telegram or Http. No coding necessary.
https://about.gitlab.com/product/pages/ - — Hosting static site directly from GitLab repository
https://bip.sh - Bip provides zero downtime deployment, a global CDN, SSL, and more for static websites. Free plan only for 7days.
https://bip.sh - Bip provides zero downtime deployment, a global CDN, SSL, and more for static websites. Free plan only for 7 days.
https://shtab.app/ - Project management service that makes collaboration in the office and remotely transparent with tracker based on AI.

https://testtls.com - Test a SSL/TLS service for secure server configuration, certificates, chains etc. Not limited to HTTPS.
https://www.easyretro.io/ - Free simple and intuitive sprint retrospective tool
https://postale.io/) — Free domain email addresses for up to 2 users per domain, one domain (per account - Free domain email addresses for up to 2 users per domain, one domain (per account), POP3/IMAP enabled, no ads
https://erratic.host - — 1.5 GB storage, unlimited bandwidth, PHP 8, DNS Manager, cPanel, Software Installer, E-Mail Accounts. Run your own website without any questions
https://formspree.io/ - Send email using an HTTP POST request. Free tier limits to 50 submissions per form per month.
https://web3forms.com - Contact forms for Static & JAMStack Websites without writing backend code. Free plan allows Unlimited Forms, Unlimited Domains & 250 Submissions per month.
https://localazy.com - Free for 1000 source language strings, unlimited languages, unlimited contributors, startup and open source deals
https://ubiqsecurity.com/ - — Encrypt and decrypt data with 3 lines of code and automatic key management. Free for 1 application and up to 1,000,000 encryptions per month.
https://codekeep.io - Google Keep for Code Snippets. Organize,Discover and share code snippets, featuring a powerful code screenshot tool with preset templates and linking feature.
https://etf-data.com/ - API](https://etf-data.com/) - Quality European ETF, ETN and ETC data, updated daily. The API offers complete overview including sector, country, factor, dividend yield and valuations. Additionally basic information such as domicile, followed index, asset class, fee, currency, replication method, distribution type and frequency. 50 free API calls per day.
https://www.scraperapi.com/ - — Cloud based web scraping API handles proxies, browsers, and CAPTCHAs. Scrape any web page with a simple API call. Get started with 1000 free API calls/month.
https://unixtime.co.za - Free API to convert Unixtime to DateTime and vice versa.
https://www.stackhawk.com/ - application scanning throughout your pipeline to find and fix security bugs before they hit production. Unlimited scans and environments for a single app.
https://testtls.com - Test a SSL/TLS service for secure server configuration, certificates, chains etc. Not limited to HTTPS.
https://www.deta.sh - Deploy unlimited number of Node.js and Python apps for free up to 50k requests/month. Includes free DBs, Auth and email.
https://theendlessweb.com/ - — 300 MB storage, Free SSL, PHP, MySQL, FTP, free sub-domains, E-Mail, DNS, beatiful panel UI. One of the best!
https://fosshost.org/ - Free open source hosting VPS, web, storage and mirror hosting
https://www.cloudamqp.com/ - RabbitMQ as a Service, up to 1M messages/month and 20 connections free
https://grapedrop.com/ - Responsive, powerful, SEO optimized web page builder based on GrapesJS Framework. Free for first 5 pages, unlimited custom domains, all features and simple usage.
https://graphcomment.com/ - GraphComment is a comments platform that helps you build an active community from website’s audience.
https://form2channel.com - Place a static html form on your website and receive submissions directly to Google Sheets, Email, Slack, Telegram or Http. No coding necessary.

https://about.gitlab.com/product/continuous-integration/ - Create pipelines directly from Git repositories using GitLab's CI service. 400 mins/mo per top-level group
https://graphcms.com/ - Offers free tier for small projects. GraphQL first API. Move away from legacy solutions to the GraphQL native Headless CMS - and deliver omnichannel content API first.
https://quickmocker.com/) — Manage online fake API endpoints under your own subdomain, forward requests to localhost URL for webhooks development and testing, use RegExp and multiple HTTP methods for URL path, prioritize endpoints, more than 100 shortcodes (dynamic or fake response values) for response templating, import from OpenAPI (Swagger - Manage online fake API endpoints under your own subdomain, forward requests to localhost URL for webhooks development and testing, use RegExp and multiple HTTP methods for URL path, prioritize endpoints, more than 100 shortcodes (dynamic or fake response values) for response templating, import from OpenAPI (Swagger) Specifications in JSON format, proxy requests, restrict endpoint by IP address and authorization header. Free account provides 1 random subdomain, 10 endpoints, 5 RegExp URL paths, 50 shortcodes per endpoint, 100 requests per day, 50 history records in requests log.
https://grafana.com/products/cloud/) - Grafana Cloud. Free: 3 users, 10 dashboards, 100 alerts, metrics storage in Prometheus and Graphite (10,000 series, 14 days retention), logs storage in Loki (50 GB of logs, 14 days retention)

https://zeet.co/ - Zeet is the easiest and fastest way to deploy and scale your code. It supports both code from GitHub or any public Docker image. Only one project is free.
https://www.24browser.com - Capture beautifully rendered website screenshots at scale with powerful API.

https://cronhooks.io/ - Schedule one time or recurring webhooks using api and web app. Free plan allows 1 webhook schedule.
https://www.ably.com/ - Realtime messaging service with presence, persistence and guaranteed delivery. Free plan includes 3m messages per month, 100 peak connections and 100 peak channels.
https://forwardemail.net) — Free email forwarding for custom domains. https://roboflow.com - create and deploy a custom computer vision model with no prior machine learning experience required. Free tier includes up to 1,000 free source images.
https://glitchtip.com/ - Simple, open source error tracking. Compatible with open-source Sentry SDKs. 1000 events per month for free, or can self-host with no limits
https://www.loadmill.com/ - Automatically create API and load tests by analyzing network traffic. Simulate up to 50 concurrent users for up to 60 minutes for free every month.
https://glitchtip.com/ - Simple, open source error tracking. Compatible with open-source Sentry SDKs. 1000 events per month for free, or can self-host with no limits
https://logdna.com - Free for a single user, no retention, unlimited hosts and sources
https://kitemaker.co - Collaborate through all phases of the product development process and keep track of work across Slack, Discord, Figma, and Github. Unlimited users, unlimited spaces. Free plan up to 250 work items.
https://www.pubnub.com/ - Swift, Kotlin and React messaging at 1 million transactions each month. Transactions may contain multiple messages.
https://kitemaker.co - Collaborate through all phases of the product development process and keep track of work across Slack, Discord, Figma, and Github. Unlimited users, unlimited spaces. Free plan up to 250 work items.

https://darklang.com/ - Hosted editor/language/infrastructure
https://darklang.com/ - Hosted editor/language/infrastructure

https://www.goatcounter.com/) — GoatCounter is an open source web analytics platform available as a hosted service (free for non-commercial use - GoatCounter is an open source web analytics platform available as a hosted service (free for non-commercial use) or self-hosted app. It aims to offer easy to use and meaningful privacy-friendly web analytics as an alternative to Google Analytics or Matomo. Free tier is for non-commerical use and includes unlimited number of sites, 6 months of data retention, and 100k pageviews/month.
https://redirection.io/ - SaaS tool for managing HTTP redirections for businesses, marketing and SEO.
#other-free-resources - Resources](#other-free-resources)
https://mixpanel.com/ - 100,000 monthly tracked users, unlimited data history and seats, US or EU data residency
https://darklang.com/ - Hosted language combined with editor and infrastructure. Free during the beta, generous free tier planned after beta.
https://analytics.ao.gl/ - — Forever FREE Customer Analytics for ALL your websites, with Unlimited Events per month
https://workspaces.openshift.com/ - - Web based and Kubernetes-Native IDE for Developer Teams with multi-language support. Open Source and community driven. A online instance hosted by Red Hat is available at [workspaces.openshift.com](https://workspaces.openshift.com/).
https://newsapi.org - — Search news on the web with code, get JSON results. Developers get 3,000 queries free each month.
https://smartcar.com - - An API for cars to locate, get fuel tank, battery levels, odometer, unlock/lock doors, etc.
https://PhantomJsCloud.com - Browser automation and page rendering. Free Tier offers up to 500 pages/day. Free Tier since 2017.
https://pagure.io - Pagure.io is a free and open source software code collaboration platform for FOSS-licensed projects, Git-based
https://issueembed.dev/ - - A bug reporting tool for websites to go directly into your Github Issues. Free plan for personal repositories with up to 500 issues/month and 10,000 page views/month.
https://simplelocalize.io/ - Free up to 100 translation keys, unlimited strings, unlimited languages, startup deals
https://efemarai.com - Testing and debugging platform for ML models and data. Visualize any computational graph. Free 30 debugging sessions per month for developers.
https://cmd.com/ - Security platform providing real-time access control and dynamic policy enforcement on every Linux instance in your cloud or datacenter
https://www.logrocket.com - 1,000 sessions/month with 30 day retention, error tracking, live mode
https://www.wormhol.org/ - Straightforward file sharing service. Share unlimited files up to 5GB to as many peers as you want.
https://cloudinary.com/ - Image upload, powerful manipulations, storage and delivery for sites and apps, with libraries for Ruby, Python, Java, PHP, Objective-C and more. Free tier includes 25 monthly credits. 1 credit is equal to 1,000 image transformations, 1 GB of storage, or 1 GB of CDN usage.
https://www.newrelic.com - New Relic observability platform built to help engineers create more perfect software. From monoliths to serverless, you can instrument everything, then analyze, troubleshoot, and optimize your entire software stack. Free tier offers 100GB/month of free data ingest, 1 free full access user, and unlimited free basic users.
https://developers.arcgis.com - APIs and SDKs for maps, geospatial data storage, analysis, geocoding, routing, and more across web, desktop, and mobile. 2,000,000 free basemap tiles, 20,000 non-stored geocodes, 20,000 simple routes, 5,000 drive time calculations, 5GB free tile+data storage per month.
https://ipapi.co/) - IP Address Location API by Kloudend, Inc - A reliable geolocation API, built on AWS, trusted by Fortune 500. Free tier offers 30k lookups/month (1k/day - IP Address Location API by Kloudend, Inc - A reliable geolocation API, built on AWS, trusted by Fortune 500. Free tier offers 30k lookups/month (1k/day) without signup. Contact us for a higher limit trial plan.
https://doppler.com/ - Universal Secrets Manager for application secrets and config, with support for syncing to various cloud providers. Free for unlimited users with basic access controls.
https://octopus.com - - Automated deployment and release-management. Free for <= 10 deployment targets.
https://www.thundra.io/apm - Application monitoring and debugging. Has a free tier up to 250k monthly invocations.
https://ploi.io/ - Server management tool to easily manage and deploy your servers & sites. Free for 1 server.
https://updrafts.app - WYSIWYG web site builder for tailwindcss based designs. Free for non-commercial usage.
https://3v4l.org/ - Free online PHP shell and snippet sharing site, runs your code in 300+ PHP versions
https://avo.app/ - Simplified analytics release workflow. Single-source-of-truth tracking plan, type safe analytics tracking library, in-app debuggers, data observability to catch all data issues before you release. Free for 2 workspace members and 1 hour data observability lookback.
https://holistic.dev/ - The #1 static code analyzer for Postgresql optimization. Performance, security, and architect database issues automatic detection service
https://parsers.dev/ - Abstract syntax tree parsers and intermediate representation compilers as a service
https://seatable.io/ - Flexible, Spreadsheet-like Database built by Seafile team. unlimited tables, 2,000 lines, 1-month versioning, up to 25 team members.
https://linear.app/) — Issue tracker with streamlined interface. Free for unlimited members, up to 10MB file upload size, 250 issues (excluding Archive - Issue tracker with streamlined interface. Free for unlimited members, up to 10MB file upload size, 250 issues (excluding Archive)

https://fibery.io/ - Connected workspace platform. Free for single user, up to 2 GB disk space.
https://www.yodiz.com/ - Agile development and issue tracking. Free up to 3 users, unlimited projects.

A free tier for a single user with limited checkpoints per week.

https://www.tiny.cloud - rich text editing API. Core features free for unlimited usage.

https://connectycube.com - APIs for realtime messaging, voice & video calling, push notifications, files storage and users management. Free for apps up to 20K MAU.

https://updrafts.app - WYSIWYG web site builder for tailwindcss based designs. Free for non-commercial usage.

https://products.office.com/microsoft-teams/free - — Microsoft Teams is a chat-based digital hub that brings conversations, content, and apps together in one place all from a single experience. Free for up to 500k users.

https://getjsonip.com - — Returns the Public IP address of the client it is requested from. No registration required for free tier. Using CORS data can be requested using client side JS directly from browser. Useful for services monitoring change in client and server IPs. Unlimited Requests.

https://appetize.io - Test your Android & iOS apps on this Cloud Based Android Phone/Tablets emulators and iPhone/iPad simulators directly in your browser. Free tier includes 1 concurrent session with 100 minutes usage per month. No limit on app size.

https://www.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/enterprise/e5) (Windows excluded) which is renewable. It is renewed if you're active in development(measured using telemetry data & algorithms - Developer Program](https://developer.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/dev-program) — Get a free sandbox, tools, and other resources you need to build solutions for the Microsoft 365 platform. The subscription is a 90-day [Microsoft 365 E5 Subscription](https://www.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/enterprise/e5) (Windows excluded) which is renewable. It is renewed if you're active in development(measured using telemetry data & algorithms).
https://code.sololearn.com - A cloud programming playground well-suited for running code snippets. Supports various programming languages. No registration required for running code but required when you need to save code on their platform. Also offers free courses for begginers and intermediate level coders.
https://github.com/ripienaar/free-for-dev - the result of Pull Requests, reviews, ideas and work done by 900+ people. You too can help by sending [Pull Requests](https://github.com/ripienaar/free-for-dev) to add more services or by remove ones whose offerings have changed or been retired.
https://protectumus.com) - Free website security check, site antivirus and server firewall (WAF - Free website security check, site antivirus and server firewall (WAF) for PHP. Email notifications for registered users in free tier.
https://www.mendix.com/ - Rapid Application Development for Enterprises, unlimited number of free sandbox environments supporting unlimited users, 0.5 GB storage and 1 GB RAM per app. Also Studio and Studio Pro IDEs are allowed in free tier.
https://qualtrics.com/free-account - — Create professional forms & survey using this first class tool. 50+ expert-designed survey templates. Free Account has limit of 1 active survey, 100 responses/survey & 8 response types.
https://curlhub.io - Proxy service for inspecting and debugging API calls. Free plan includes 10,000 requests per month.
https://hookbin.com/) - Create unique (public or private - Create unique (public or private) endpoints to collect, parse, and inspect HTTP requests. Inspect headers, body, query strings, cookies, uploaded files, etc. Useful for testing/inspecting webhook. Similar to RequestBin, and Webhook.site.
https://freedns.afraid.org/domain/registry/ - Free DNS hosting. Also provide free subdomain based on numerous public user [contributed domains](https://freedns.afraid.org/domain/registry/). Get free subdomains from "Subdomains" menu after signing up.

Free developer program gives a personal development sandbox license for Tableau Online. The version is the latest pre-release version so Data Devs can test each & every feature of this superb platform.

Support files up to 50 GB (for paid plans). Free tier is limited by file size and number of conversions per day.
https://conversiontools.io/) - Online File Converter for documents, images, video, audio, eBooks. REST API is available. Libraries for Node.js, PHP, Python. Support files up to 50 GB (for paid plans - - Online File Converter for documents, images, video, audio, eBooks. REST API is available. Libraries for Node.js, PHP, Python. Support files up to 50 GB (for paid plans). Free tier is limited by file size and number of conversions per day.
https://continuousphp.com/ - — continuousphp is the first and only PHP-centric Platform to build, package, test and deploy applications in the same workflow. Free for Community Projects i.e. OSS/Public/Educational projects.
https://imagekit.io - Image CDN with automatic optimization, real-time transformation, and storage that you can integrate with existing setup in minutes. Free plan includes up to 20GB bandwidth per month.
https://github.com/) — Unlimited public repositories and unlimited private repositories (with unlimited collaborators). Apart from this some other free services(there are much more but we list the main ones here - Unlimited public repositories and unlimited private repositories (with unlimited collaborators). Apart from this some other free services(there are much more but we list the main ones here) provided are :
https://github.com/features/actions)(Free for Public Repos, 2000 min/month for private repos free - Public Repos, 2000 min/month for private repos free)
https://pages.github.com) (Free for Public Repos - Hosting](https://pages.github.com) (Free for Public Repos)
https://github.com/features/packages) (Free for public repos,500 MB storage & 1GB bandwidth outside CI/CD free for private repos - & Container Registry](https://github.com/features/packages) (Free for public repos,500 MB storage & 1GB bandwidth outside CI/CD free for private repos)
https://about.gitlab.com/ - Unlimited public and private Git repos with unlimited collaborators. Also offers the following features :
https://appflux.io - Project Management tool with Log Management & Issues. Take your team onboard & forget management through emails.
https://about.gitlab.com/product/continuous-integration) (Free for Public Repos, 400 mins/month for private repos - for Public Repos, 400 mins/month for private repos)
https://about.gitlab.com/product/pages - with [GitLab Pages](https://about.gitlab.com/product/pages).
https://penpot.app - Web based, open source design and prototyping tool. Supports SVG. Completely free.
https://apitemplate.io - Auto-generate social images and PDF documents with a simple API or automation tools like Zapier & Airtable. No CSS/HTML required.
https://webshrinker.com - Web Shrinker provides web site screenshot and domain intelligence API services. Free 100 requests/month.
https://catchjs.com/ - JavaScript error tracking with screenshots and click trails. Free for open source projects.
https://apitemplate.io - Auto-generate images and PDF documents with a simple API or automation tools like Zapier & Airtable. No CSS/HTML required. Free plan comes with 50 images/month and 3 templates.
https://sider.review - Code review platform for many languages. Supports integration with GitHub. Free for public repositories with unlimited users.
https://formspark.io/ - Form to Email service, free plan allows unlimited forms, 250 submissions per month, support by Customer assistance team.
https://getform.io/ - Form backend platform for designers and developers, 1 form, 50 submissions, Single file upload, 100MB file storage.
https://pageclip.co/ - Free plan allows one site, one form, 1,000 submissions per month.
https://smartforms.dev/ - Powerful and easy form backend for your website, forever free plan allows 50 submissions per month, 250MB file storage, Zapier integration, CSV/JSON export, custom redirect, custom response page, Telegram & Slack bot, single email notifications.
https://www.zoho.com/forms/ - - with 40+ field types, customizable themes, situation-specific templates, and a simple user interface, helps you create beautiful, functional forms for all your needs. Free plan allows 3 forms, 500 submissions/month, 200 MB File storage.
https://layerci.com - CI for full stack projects. 1 full stack preview environment with 5GB memory & 3 CPUs .
https://developer.suse.com - Program](https://developer.suse.com) — Experience cloud native productivity for free. Get hands-on with the SUSE Cloud Application Platform with your own Developer Sandbox. 1 Free Application. Free subdomain provided along with API for CLI. Storage & Memory Quota of 1 GB.
https://developer.salesforce.com/signup - Program](https://developer.salesforce.com/signup) — Build apps Lightning fast with drag and drop tools. Customize your data model with clicks. Go further with Apex code. Integrate with anything using powerful APIs. Stay protected with enterprise-grade security. Customize UI with clicks or any leading-edge web framework. Free Developer Program gives access to the full Lightining Platform.
https://developers.bmc.com/site/global/bmc_helix_platform/program/overview/index.gsp - Program](https://developers.bmc.com/site/global/bmc_helix_platform/program/overview/index.gsp) — The BMC Developer Program provides documentation and resources to build and deploy digital innovations for your enterprise. Access to a comprehensive, personal sandbox which includes the platform, SDK, and a library of components that can be used to build and tailor apps.
https://developer.servicenow.com/ - Program](https://developer.servicenow.com/) — Rapidly build, test, and deploy applications that make work better for your organization. Free Instance & access early previews.
https://pinata.cloud - — Pinata is the simplest way to upload and manage files on IPFS. Our friendly user interface combined with our IPFS API makes Pinata the easiest IPFS pinning service for platforms, creators, and collectors. 1 GB storage free along with access to API.
https://kritika.io/ - Static Code Analysis for Perl with integration for GitHub. Free for unlimited public repositories.
https://vaadin.com - Build scalable UIs in Java or TypeScript, and use the integrated tooling, components and design system to iterate faster, design better and simplify the development process. Unlimited Projects with 5 years free maintenance.
https://codebeat.co - Automated Code Review Platform available for many languages. Free forever for public repositories with Slack & E-mail integration.
https://icons8.com - Icons, illustrations, photos, music, and design tools. Free Plan offers Limited formats in lower resolution. Link to Icons8 when you use our assets.
https://rive.app - Create and ship beautiful animations to any platform. Free forever for Individuals. The service is a editor which hosts all the graphics on their servers as well. They also provide runtimes for many platforms to run graphics made using Rive.
https://smartmockups.com/ - Create product mockups, 200 free mockups.
https://percy.io - Add visual testing to any web app, static site, style guide, or component library. Unlimited team members, Demo app and unlimited projects, 5,000 snapshots / month.
https://www.zoho.com - Started as an e-mail provider but now provides a suite of services out of which some of them have free plans. List of services having free plans :
https://zoho.com/mail - for 5 users. 5GB/user & 25 MB attachment limit, 1 domain.
https://zoho.com/sprints - for 5 users,5 Projects & 500MB storage.
https://zoho.com/docs) — Free for 5 users with 1 GB upload limit & 5GB storage. Zoho Office Suite (Writer,Sheets & Show - Free for 5 users with 1 GB upload limit & 5GB storage. Zoho Office Suite (Writer,Sheets & Show) comes bundled with it.
https://zoho.com/bugtracker - Free for 3 users, 2 projects & 10 MB attachment limit. Same plan applies to [Bugtracker](https://zoho.com/bugtracker).
https://zoho.com/connect - Team Collaboration free for 25 users with 3 groups, 3 custom apps, 3 Boards, 3 Manuals, 10 Integrations along with channels,events & forums.
https://zoho.com/meeting - Meetings with upto 3 meeting participants & 10 Webinar attendees.
https://zoho.com/vault - Password Management free for Individuals.
https://zoho.com/showtime - Yet another Meeting software for training for a remote session upto 5 attendees.
https://zoho.com/notebook - A free alternative to Evernote.
https://zoho.com/wiki - Free for 3 users with 50 MB storage, unlimited pages, zip backups, RSS & Atom feed, access controls & customisable CSS.
https://zoho.com/subscriptions - Recurring Billing management free for 20 customers/subscriptions & 1 user with all the payment hosting done by Zoho themselves. Last 40 subscription metrics are stored
https://zoho.com/checkout - Product Billing management with 3 pages & up to 50 payments.
https://zoho.com/assist - Customer Support management with 3 agents and private knowledge base, email tickets. Integrates with [Assist](https://zoho.com/assist) for 1 remote technician & 5 unattended computers.
https://zoho.com/cliq - Team chat software with 100 GB storage, unlimited users, 100 users per channel & SSO.
https://zoho.com/campaigns -
https://zoho.com/forms -
https:/zoho.com/sign -
https://zoho.com/surveys -
https://zoho.com/bookings -
https://zoho.com/analytics -
https://zube.io - Project management with free plan for 4 Projects & 4 users. GitHub integration available.
https://codeblocks.org - Free Fortran & C/C++ IDE. Open Source and runs on Windows,macOS & Linux.
https://elementor.com - WordPress website builder. Free plan available with 40+ Basic Widgets.
https://www.birdeatsbug.com/) — Report bugs faster (and better - Bug](https://www.birdeatsbug.com/) — Report bugs faster (and better). Record your screen with Bird browser extension, it will auto-capture technical data that engineers need to debug. Free tier suitable for small teams.
https://stackby.com/ - One tool that brings together flexibility of spreadsheets, power of databases and built-in integrations with your favorite business apps. Free plan includes unlimited users, 10 stacks, 2GB attachment per stack.
https://clicky.com - Website Analytics Platform. Free Plan for 1 website with 3000 views analytics.
https://blynk.io - A SaaS with API to control, build & evaluate IoT devices. Free Developer Plan with 5 devices,Free Cloud & data storage. Mobile Apps also available.
https://clicky.com - Website Analytics Platform. Free Plan for 1 website with 3000 views analytics.
https://blynk.io - A SaaS with API to control, build & evaluate IoT devices. Free Developer Plan with 5 devices,Free Cloud & data storage. Mobile Apps also available.
https://mergify.io - workflow automation and merge queue for GitHub — Free for public GitHub repositories
https://www.namiml.com/ - Complete platform for in-app purchases and subscriptions on iOS and Android, including no-code paywalls, CRM, and analytics. Free for all base features to run an IAP business.
https://analytics.google.com/ - — Google Analytics
https://hotjar.com) — Website Analytics and Reports . Free Plan allows 2000 pageviews/day. 100 snapshots/day (max capacity: 300 - Website Analytics and Reports . Free Plan allows 2000 pageviews/day. 100 snapshots/day (max capacity: 300). 3 snapshot heatmaps which can be stored for 365 days. Unlimited Team Members.
https://statcounter.com/ - Website Viewer Analytics. Free plan for analytics of 500 most recent visitors.
https://www.abstractapi.com/ip-geolocation-api - API](https://www.abstractapi.com/ip-geolocation-api) — IP Geolocation API from Abstract - Extensive free plan allowing 200,000 requests per month.
https://codegiant.io - Project Management with Repository hosting & CI/CD. Free Plan Offers Unlimited Repositories,Projects & Documents with 5 Team Members. 500 CI/CD minutes per month. 30000 Serverless Code Run minutes per month.1GB repository storage.
https://powerbi.com - — Business Insights & Analytics by Microsoft. Free Plan offers limited use with 1 Million User licenses.
https://www.manageengine.com/cloud-log-management - Cloud](https://www.manageengine.com/cloud-log-management) — Log Management service powered by Manage Engine. Free Plan offers 50 GB storage with 1 Month retention.
https://arvancloud.com/) — Offers cloud related services (CDN,Cloud DNS, PaaS, Security etc. - — Offers cloud related services (CDN,Cloud DNS, PaaS, Security etc.). Free plan offers :
https://rocketgit.com - Repository Hosting based on Git. Unlimited Public & Private repositories.
https://similarweb.com - — Analytics for Web & Mobile Apps. Free Plan offers 5 results per metric, 1 month of mobile app data & 3 months of website data.
https://snapshooter.com/ - Backup solution for DigitalOcean, AWS, LightSail, Hetzner and Exoscale, with support for direct database, file system and application backups to s3 based storage. Provides a free plan with daily backups for one resource.
https://miradore.com - Management service. Stay up-to-date with your device fleet and secure an unlimited number of devices for free. Free plan offers basic features.
https://bluej.org - A free Java Development Environment designed for beginners, used by millions worldwide. Powered by Oracle & simple GUI to help beginners.
https://automate.io - Simple and complex automation workflow tool with over 200+ app integrations. 300 monthly actions and 5 bots are free
https://developer.deepar.ai) — Augmented reality face filters for any platform with one SDK. Free plan provides up to 10 monthly active users (MAU - Augmented reality face filters for any platform with one SDK. Free plan provides up to 10 monthly active users (MAU) and tracking up to 4 faces
https://miradore.com - Device Management service. Stay up-to-date with your device fleet and secure an unlimited number of devices for free. Free plan offers basic features.
https://branch.io - Mobile Analytics Platform. Free Tier offers upto 10K Mobile App Users with deep-linking & other services.
https://www.koyeb.com - Koyeb is a developer-friendly serverless platform to deploy apps globally. Seamlessly run Docker containers, web apps, and APIs with git-based deployment, native autoscaling, a global edge network, and built-in service mesh and discovery. Koyeb provides two nano services to run your apps with its forever-free tier and also sponsors open-source projects with free resources.
https://freecurrencyapi.net/ - Free currency conversion and exchange rate data API. 10 requests/hour without an API key, 50 000 requests per month when you register for free.
http://maps.stamen.com/ - Free map tiles and tile hosting.
https://robocorp.com - Open-source stack for powering Automation Ops. Try out Cloud features and implement simple automations for free. Robot work 240 min/month, 10 Assistant runs, Storage of 100 MB.
https://treescale.com/ - Host and manage container images with group permissions. Free tier offers 1 GB storage for private repositories.
https://www.lazarus-ide.org/ - Lazarus is a Delphi compatible cross-platform IDE for Rapid Application Development.
https://www.lazarus-ide.org/ - Lazarus is a Delphi compatible cross-platform IDE for Rapid Application Development.
